Question
========
Two objects collide and stick together. Linear momentum is

Answerlist
----------
* definitely conserved.
* definitely not conserved.
* conserved only if the collision is elastic.
* conserved only if there is no friction.

Solution
========
Linear momentum is conserved during any type of collision.
